title: Chris Spencer
description:
On this episode Kevin talks with comedian and writer Chris Spencer. They discuss Chris’s career as a comedian, why he feels he’s ready for the next level of stardom, the time Kevin offered Chris a job as the head of his company, and why he may be the most connected man in Hollywood.
